title: i have a problem with the Honor thing
body: why i never level up my honor(i got banned a very long time ago and i got lvl 0)

replies.body: Your Honor rank was dropped recently due to the last punishment this account received. Punishments like this drop your rank to 1 or 0, then you need to show consistent behavior improvement until your honor will start to rise again. It looks like there are certain chat logs that were borderline punishable, but instead of hitting you again it decided to slow your honor progress instead.
